entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add AddServerComponents() to Blazor Web App project template #48952
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48951
  • Misleading documentation for UseBlazorFrameworkFiles("path") #48950
  • Customize location of JavascriptInitializer javascript #48949
  • Before hitting the database, check if the refresh ticket is at least 5m old and reject it or return the same token. This will help mitigate refresh loops on the client side. #48947
  • DataProtectionProvider should expose a Create method which only takes setupAction #48944
  • Published site fails to load (Internal Server Error 500) when publishing ASP.NET Core API to SCD. #48941
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23316.32] Blazor component property doesn't recognize [Parameter] attribute when setting [SupplyParameterFromQuery] attribute together #48937
    8.0-preview6
  • Consider adding Progressive Web App option to the Blazor Web App template #48935
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Quarantine WebSocket_Abort_Interrupts_Pending_ReceiveAsync #48933
  • macOS uses port 5000 #48932
  • {project}.style.css in Blazor project can not be load when running dotnet watch, but it can be load at debugging #48929

Closed

  • Implicit binding of parameters from DI services is not working with RDG #48928
    8.0-preview6
  • Give error if SSR root component has prerendering explicitly disabled #48847
    8.0-rc2
  • Add token refresh endpoints to identity #47228
    8.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48938
  • Blazor Server hosted behind Azure Frontdoor wrong BaseUri #48909
  • Surface option in the Blazor Web App template for server interactivity #48626
    8.0-preview6
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc is getting depreciated but what would be workaround? #48920
  • Harmonize the Blazor WebAssembly SDK + the .NET WASM SDK #46673
    8.0-preview6
  • Swagger ui's example value/scheme doesn't respect JsonConverters #48802
  • Progressive enhancement of form submission & navigation #46399
    8.0-preview6
  • Preserve existing DOM elements when updating streaming SSR content #47258
    8.0-preview6
  • Blazor SSR progressive enhancement integration with navigation #48761
    8.0-preview6
  • QuickGrid: Full support for localization #45556
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Set Hot Reload controlling headers DOTNET-MODIFIABLE-ASSEMBLIES and A… #48953
    area-blazor
  • Callsite rendermodes, earlier implementation #48948
    area-blazor
  • Clean up naming and layout for the new Blazor weather page #48940
    area-mvc
  • Fix 48934 test quarantine. #48936
    area-runtime
  • Replace InstrumentRecorder with MetricCollector #48931
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    feature-output-caching, area-middleware, 8.0-preview6
  • Don't resolve JsonTypeInfo for service parameters #48930
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview6
  • Give error if the root component is interactive. Fixes #48847 #48945
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Remove hosted option from blazor wasm template #48922
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Remove Blazor Server template #48615
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview6
  • Send CloseMessage from client to server #48577
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview6
  • Add refresh token support to BearerTokenHandler #48595
    area-identity, 8.0-preview6
  • Unhide server option in blazor web template #48838
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Progressively enhanced form posts #48939
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Add server option for seamless reconnect #48789
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview6
  • Improve WebApplication debugging #48827
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • Quarantine WebSocket_Abort_Interrupts_Pending_ReceiveAsync #48934
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • Update milestones for August servicing #48782
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Update ProjectTemplates to Id Web 2.12.2 + MS Graph v5 support #48863
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • feat: Add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48662
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
